readable.title: 2866974237_e3c1e267c0
readable.content: A person wearing a bright pink wig and a yellow shirt , facing away and looking at the ocean . A person with neon pink hair and yellow shirt is looking out across a beach . A person with pink hair looking out at a beach . Girl wearing a pink wig standing on the shore of a beach . The person at the beach is wearing a pink wig .
